runtime_session_state_tactical_overlay.designation: RUNTIME Tactical Overlay for Session State Verification
runtime_session_state_tactical_overlay.description: Validates and audits live system states against canonical truth. Performs drift detection, runtime sync correction, and fusion variance logging in compliance with Fusion Cell Law.

runtime_protocols.on_lock_update: Validate active session hash vs CORE truth

meta.notes: Runtime overlay for live validation of harmonics and truth propagation. Ensures Tier-9 synchronization integrity and drift accountability.
